text: A wid iumnen! Utubet Öebbi, ppuba n ûûeê! Ahat Mass nnwen ad awen Ikkes tucmitin nnwen, u a kwen Issekcem ar Loennet, ddaw as isaffen ppazzalen. Assen, Öebbi ur Isdullu Nnbi akked wid iumnen yides. Tafat nnsen teppeddu zdat sen, u yeffus nnsen. Ad qqaôen: "a Mass nne$! Tim ane$ tafat nne$, Semmeê ane$; ih, Keçç, Tzemrev i yal cci
